verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
I am covered over
With the robe of righteousness
That Jesus gives to me
(gives to me)
I am covered over
With the righteous blood of Jesus
And He lives in me
(lives in me)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
What a joy to know
The heavenly Father loves me so
And gives to me - My Jesus.
When He looks at me,
He sees not what I used to be
But He sees Jesus.
